title: Cognitive Load Management Strategies Through Text Layout Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental document reading skills and understanding of mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Educational Program Applying Text Layout Design Principles to Help Professionals Efficiently Acquire Work-Related Mathematical Concepts

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of single/multi-column layouts on cognitive load through EEG data within two weeks.
Learners can propose at least three optimal text layout strategies that minimize cognitive load when designing work documents.
Learners can explain differences in cognitive efficiency across various layout types with over 80% accuracy in formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
